main event: Two independent witnesses observed an unidentified object that flashed and changed colors from white, green, and blue over Jeffersonville, Ohio on July 17, 1968.
interesting points: One observer described the object as resembling a balloon rising and falling with airflow., The object emitted no sounds or odors during the sighting., The observers noted the object disappeared at 03:30 AM., The sighting lasted approximately 5 to 10 minutes., The event was recorded as a probable astro phenomenon attributed to stars or planets.
sighted object: an unidentified object flashing in colors
witness description: two independent witnesses, one being a deputy sheriff
